mapper.insert: insert into upms_company_user_snaps SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S%f')/1000 AS UNSIGNED),tb.* from upms_company_user as tb where company_user_id= #{company_user_id}
